item.title: About me
item.description: ZiyanZOU@link.cuhk.edu.hk EDUCATION BACKGROUND University of Alberta — Doctor of Philosophy in Linguistics Sep 2024 – Chinese University of Hong Kong — Master of Arts Sep 2021 – Jul 2022 Major: Chinese linguistics and language acquisition University of Science & Technology Beijing — Bachelor of Law Sep 2016– Jun 2020 Major: Social Work PRESENTATION Ziyan ZOU & YOU Shuxiang 2023. How Gender Affects Immigrants Accents variation – An acoustic study on Hunan immigrants in Beijing.
